snippet: Some of the best high school track runners in the country got a chance to compete with professional counterparts at the Adidas Grand Prix on Randalls Island.
abstract: Adidas Grand Prix on Randalls Island in New York gives some of best high school track runners in country chance to compete with their professional counterparts; Abeba Aregawi wins 1,500 meters and sets a meet record with a time of 4 minutes 00.13 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Some of the best high school track runners in the country got a chance to compete with professional counterparts at the Adidas Grand Prix on Randalls Island.

headline.main: High School Stars Mix With Pros at Grand Prix
headline.print_headline: High School Stars Mix With Pros at Grand Prix
